definitions.definition: A gullible fool , especially an elderly person with impaired faculties.
A small brown-and-black bird of species Charadrius morinellus , of the plover family.
Any of various small birds of Australasia thought to resemble the Eurasian dotterel.

main_definition: A gullible fool , especially an elderly person with impaired faculties. [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: A small brown-and-black bird of species Charadrius morinellus , of the plover family. [from 15th c.]
( Australia , New Zealand ) Any of various small birds of Australasia thought to resemble the Eurasian dotterel. [from 19th c.]
